name: EMALGIA (Demo)
description:
Who is lying to you..?
EMALGIA is a demo project for a game I was working on for college. Our only limitation was our theme which is 'Text Based Adventure Game'.

EMALGIA takes place in a floppy disk, where you meet M4X, he seems friendly but something is off about the whole encounter..

Perhaps someday I will turn it into a full game, but I'm not sure, If you think you'd want to see this in a full game then definitely rate the prototype  :P
